decay.name: Pestilent Strike
decay.text: Deal 5. Apply 2 Poison.

decay.name: Rotting Slash
decay.text: Deal 3 twice. If the target has Poison, remove up to 2 Poison and deal 2 damage per Poison removed.

decay.name: Contagion Strike
decay.text: Deal 9. Apply 2 Poison. If the target has 4+ Poison, remove up to 3 Poison and gain 1 Energy.

decay.name: Sear Decay
decay.text: Deal 6 to ALL enemies. For each enemy with Poison, remove up to 2 Poison and deal 2 damage per Poison removed to that enemy.

decay.name: Plague Burst
decay.text: Deal 12. Apply 4 Poison. Then remove up to 4 Poison and deal 3 damage per Poison removed.

decay.name: Blight Jab
decay.text: Deal 6. Gain 1 Decay Rune.

decay.name: Corrosive Edge
decay.text: Deal 10. Apply 1 Sap.

decay.name: Fungus Flail
decay.text: Deal 4 twice. Heal 3.

decay.name: Carrion Whip
decay.text: Deal 5. If the target has Poison, remove 1 Poison, heal 2, and draw 1.

decay.name: Noxious Rip
decay.text: Deal 8. If the target is below 50% HP, remove up to 3 Poison, gain 3 Block per Poison removed, then apply 1 Sap.

decay.name: Virulent Fangs
decay.text: Deal 7. Apply 3 Poison. If the target has 5+ Poison, remove up to 2 Poison and draw 2.

decay.name: Death’s Kiss
decay.text: Deal 6. Remove up to 2 Poison from the target. Gain 1 Energy if any Poison was removed.

decay.name: Putrid Cleave
decay.text: Deal 6 to ALL enemies. Apply 1 Poison to ALL enemies. If any enemy has 3+ Poison, remove 1 Poison from ALL enemies and gain 8 Block.

decay.name: Pestilence Storm
decay.text: Deal 4 damage 4 times. Randomly distribute hits. Each hit applies 1 Poison.

decay.name: Blighted Bolt
decay.text: Deal 3. Apply 2 Poison.

decay.name: Rotten Shield
decay.text: Gain 8 Block. When you are hit this turn, apply 1 Poison to the attacker.

decay.name: Carrion Cage
decay.text: Trap: The first enemy that attacks next turn takes 10 damage and 2 Poison.

decay.name: Putrid Renew
decay.text: Heal 4. Remove 1 Poison from yourself (if any).

decay.name: Festering Aura
decay.text: This combat: End of turn, if any enemy has Poison, remove 1 Poison from a random Poisoned enemy and deal 4 damage to it.

decay.name: Decay Bubble
decay.text: Gain 6 Block. If any enemy has Poison, remove up to 2 Poison from a random Poisoned enemy and gain 3 Block per Poison removed.

decay.name: Toxic Infusion
decay.text: Apply 3 Poison to a random enemy. Exhaust.

decay.name: Blight Barrier
decay.text: Gain 12 Block. Apply 1 Sap to ALL enemies.

decay.name: Infectious Veil
decay.text: Gain 5 Block. Remove up to 2 Poison from the target. Draw 1 for each Poison removed (max 2).

decay.name: Sanguine Shield
decay.text: Gain 7 Block. When that Block breaks this turn, heal 3.

decay.name: Death Sentries
decay.text: Summon a Wraith (end of turn: deal 3 to a random enemy).

decay.name: Rancid Step
decay.text: Gain Dodge. Apply 1 Poison to a random enemy.

decay.name: Decay Glyph
decay.text: This turn, your next 2 Strikes also apply +1 Poison.

decay.name: Putrid Ward
decay.text: Gain 6 Block. Apply 1 Sap to the attacker when hit this turn.

decay.name: Bone Graft
decay.text: Gain 10 Block. If you have Poison, gain +3 Block.

decay.name: Carcass Trap
decay.text: Trap: The first enemy that attacks next turn takes 6 damage. If it has Poison, remove up to 3 Poison and deal 2 damage per Poison removed.

decay.name: Corruption Ritual
decay.text: Once per combat: When you play your first Ritual, gain +1 Energy next turn.

decay.name: Rotting Ritual
decay.text: End of turn: apply 1 Poison to ALL enemies.

decay.name: Malignant Flow
decay.text: Once per turn: When your Strike hits a Poisoned enemy, draw 1.

decay.name: Necrotic Infusion
decay.text: End of turn: gain 1 Decay Rune. Also apply 1 Poison to yourself.

decay.name: Decay Communion
decay.text: Once per turn: When you remove Poison from an enemy, draw 1 and gain 2 Block.

decay.name: Toxic Transfusion
decay.text: Remove up to 3 Poison from ALL enemies. Heal 2 per Poison removed.

decay.name: Decay Surge
decay.text: Start of turn: if any enemy is Poisoned, gain +1 Energy. (Max once per turn.)

decay.name: Festering Roots
decay.text: The first time you gain Block each turn, apply 1 Poison to a random enemy.

decay.name: Blight Shield
decay.text: Start of combat: gain 8 Block. Apply 1 Poison to ALL enemies.

decay.name: Poisonous Aura
decay.text: Enemies start combat with 2 Poison.

decay.name: Death’s Embrace
decay.text: Once per turn: When your Strike hits a Poisoned enemy, heal 2.

decay.name: Pestilent Bond
decay.text: Whenever you play a Ritual, draw 1. (Max 1 per turn.)

decay.name: Blighted Path
decay.text: Next turn, your Tactics cost 0 (up to 2 cards).

decay.name: Ichor of Life
decay.text: After combat: heal 1 for each Poison you applied this combat (max 10).

decay.name: Eternal Decay
decay.text: After combat: add a random Decay card to your deck, then remove a random filler card (if any).

decay.name: Decompose
decay.text: Exhaust a card in your hand. Gain 1 Energy. Draw 1.

decay.name: Spore Cloud
decay.text: Apply 2 Poison to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

elemental.name: Flame Lash
elemental.text: Deal 6. Apply 2 Burn.

elemental.name: Ember Shot
elemental.text: Deal 5. If the target has Burn, draw 1.

elemental.name: Sunbeam
elemental.text: Deal 11. Apply 1 Burn.

elemental.name: Spark Jab
elemental.text: Deal 3 twice. If the target has Shock, apply 1 additional Shock.

elemental.name: Arc Bolt
elemental.text: Deal 10. If the target has Shock, deal +3.

elemental.name: Ice Shard
elemental.text: Deal 5. Apply 2 Chill.

elemental.name: Glacial Edge
elemental.text: Deal 4. Apply 1 Chill. Draw 1.

elemental.name: Storm Fang
elemental.text: Deal 6. If the target has Chill, apply 1 Shock.

elemental.name: Lava Burst
elemental.text: Deal 9. Apply 3 Burn. If the target has Chill, deal +2.

elemental.name: Thunder Clap
elemental.text: Deal 8 to ALL enemies. Apply 1 Shock to ALL enemies.

elemental.name: Volt Barrage
elemental.text: Deal 4 damage 4 times. Randomly distribute hits. If the hit target has Shock, deal +1.

elemental.name: Wind Cleave
elemental.text: Deal 7 to ALL enemies. If any enemy has Chill, draw 1.

elemental.name: Gale Slash
elemental.text: Deal 10. If any enemy has Chill, gain 1 Block.

elemental.name: Static Shield
elemental.text: Gain 7 Block. When you are hit this turn, apply 1 Shock to the attacker.

elemental.name: Frost Wall
elemental.text: Gain 12 Block. Apply 1 Chill to a random enemy.

elemental.name: Flame Guard
elemental.text: Gain 10 Block. When you are hit this turn, apply 2 Burn to the attacker.

elemental.name: Gust Barrier
elemental.text: Gain 6 Block. If you have Chill, draw 1.

elemental.name: Thunder Ward
elemental.text: Gain 6 Block. Your next Strike this turn deals +3.

elemental.name: Zephyr Veil
elemental.text: Gain Dodge. Draw 1.

elemental.name: Avalanche
elemental.text: Apply 2 Chill to ALL enemies. Gain 5 Block.

elemental.name: Magma Mantle
elemental.text: Gain 12 Block. Apply 1 Burn to ALL enemies.

elemental.name: Scorching Aura
elemental.text: This combat: End of turn, apply 1 Burn to a random enemy.

elemental.name: Frost Step
elemental.text: Gain Dodge. Apply 1 Chill to a random enemy. Exhaust.

elemental.name: Storm Sentinel
elemental.text: Summon a Wisp (end of turn: deal 2 to a random enemy; if they have Shock, deal +1). Gain 3 Block.

elemental.name: Elemental Ward
elemental.text: Gain 10 Block if you played a Ritual this turn, otherwise gain 6.

elemental.name: Electro Glyph
elemental.text: This turn, your next 2 Strikes also apply +1 Shock.

elemental.name: Elemental Ritual
elemental.text: Once per combat: When you play your first Ritual, gain +1 Energy next turn.

elemental.name: Burning Ritual
elemental.text: End of turn: apply 1 Burn to ALL enemies.

elemental.name: Glacial Surge
elemental.text: Start of turn: apply 1 Chill to ALL enemies.

elemental.name: Lava Flow
elemental.text: Once per turn: When you play a Strike, apply 1 Burn to the target.

elemental.name: Zephyr Shield
elemental.text: Start of combat: gain 7 Block and Dodge.

elemental.name: Storm Ritual
elemental.text: This turn, your Strikes deal +2 damage.

elemental.name: Chain Lightning
elemental.text: Deal 6 damage to 2 random enemies. Apply 1 Shock to each hit.

elemental.name: Ember Bond
elemental.text: Whenever you play a Ritual, draw 1. (Max 1 per turn.)

elemental.name: Frozen Path
elemental.text: Next turn, your Tactics cost 0 (up to 2 cards).

elemental.name: Storm’s Embrace
elemental.text: After combat: start next combat with +1 Energy.

elemental.name: Eternal Elemental
elemental.text: After combat: add a random Elemental card to your deck, then remove a random filler card (if any).

elemental.name: Rune of Elements
elemental.text: Once per turn: When you play a Strike or Tactic, apply 1 random elemental status (Burn/Chill/Shock) to a random enemy.

elemental.name: Rain Dance
elemental.text: Heal 4. Apply 1 Chill to ALL enemies.

elemental.name: Static Overload
elemental.text: Deal 9. If the target has Shock, apply 2 Burn.

elemental.name: Frozen Blast
elemental.text: Deal 12. Apply 2 Chill. If the target is already Chilled, apply 1 Shock.

elemental.name: Ember Guard
elemental.text: Gain 5 Block. Apply 1 Burn to the attacker when hit this turn.

elemental.name: Cyclone Step
elemental.text: Gain Dodge. If any enemy has Shock, draw 1. Exhaust.

elemental.name: Thermal Shift
elemental.text: Convert all Chill on enemies into Burn (1:1).

elemental.name: Eye of the Storm
elemental.text: Once per turn: When an enemy gains Shock, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies.

elemental.name: Permafrost
elemental.text: Enemies with Chill deal 1 less damage.

elemental.name: Eruption Cycle
elemental.text: End of turn: if you applied Burn this turn, apply 1 Shock to a random enemy.

growth.name: Thorn Lash
growth.text: Deal 6. If the target has at least 1 Seed Mark, deal +3.

growth.name: Blossom Strike
growth.text: Deal 5. Gain 1 Seed.

growth.name: Vine Whip
growth.text: Deal 3 twice. If you have 2+ Seeds, deal 1 extra each hit.

growth.name: Bud Burst
growth.text: Deal 12. If you have 3+ Seeds, draw 1.

growth.name: Petal Spray
growth.text: Deal 4 to ALL enemies.

growth.name: Root Smash
growth.text: Deal 9. Apply 2 Sap.

growth.name: Sap Shot
growth.text: Deal 4. Heal 3.

growth.name: Thorned Blade
growth.text: Deal 6. If this is the second Strike you played this turn, gain 1 Seed.

growth.name: Gilded Bud
growth.text: Deal 11. Gain 1 Growth Rune.

growth.name: Blooming Edge
growth.text: Deal 9. Apply 1 Fragile.

growth.name: Petal Pierce
growth.text: Deal 6. If the target is Poisoned, gain 1 Seed.

growth.name: Seeded Slash
growth.text: Deal 5. Apply 1 Seed Mark to the target.

growth.name: Thorn Barrage
growth.text: Deal 5 three times.

growth.name: Sappy Lunge
growth.text: Deal 6. If you have 0 Seeds, gain 2 Seeds.

growth.name: Vine Cleaver
growth.text: Deal 7 to ALL enemies. If you have 4+ Seeds, deal +2 to ALL enemies.

growth.name: Seed Shield
growth.text: Gain 7 Block. Gain 1 Seed.

growth.name: Vine Trap
growth.text: Set a Trap: The first enemy that attacks next turn takes 10 damage.

growth.name: Sprout Heal
growth.text: Heal 4. Draw 1.

growth.name: Fertile Soil
growth.text: Your next Strike this turn deals +3 damage. Draw 1.

growth.name: Rooting Pulse
growth.text: Apply 1 Fragile to ALL enemies. Gain 1 Seed.

growth.name: Seedlings
growth.text: Gain 2 Seeds.

growth.name: Thorn Wall
growth.text: Gain 12 Block. When you are attacked this turn, deal 3 back.

growth.name: Petal Veil
growth.text: Gain 9 Block. Reduce the next hit you take by 6.

growth.name: Sap Shield
growth.text: Gain 6 Block. The next Ritual you play this combat costs 1 less.

growth.name: Bud Barrier
growth.text: Gain 6 Block. If you have 2+ Seeds, draw 1.

growth.name: Sprout Sentry
growth.text: Summon a Seedling (end of turn: heal 2). Gain 4 Block.

growth.name: Petal Step
growth.text: Gain Dodge.

growth.name: Growth Glyph
growth.text: This turn, the next 2 Strikes you play cost 0.

growth.name: Mossy Guard
growth.text: Gain 5 Block. Gain 1 Growth Rune.

growth.name: Petal Parade
growth.text: This turn, your Strikes hit ALL enemies (at 75% damage).

growth.name: Growth Ritual
growth.text: Once per combat: When you play your first Ritual, gain +1 Energy next turn.

growth.name: Garden Bloom
growth.text: End of turn: gain 1 Seed. If you played a Strike this turn, draw 1.

growth.name: Growth Aura
growth.text: Your Strikes deal +1 damage.

growth.name: Seed Surge
growth.text: Start of turn: if you have 3+ Seeds, gain +1 Energy. (Max once per turn.)

growth.name: Thorned Roots
growth.text: The first time you gain Block each turn, apply 1 Sap to a random enemy.

growth.name: Verdant Warding
growth.text: After combat: heal 3.

growth.name: Blooming Ward
growth.text: End of turn: apply 1 Poison to ALL enemies.

growth.name: Sprouting Might
growth.text: If you played 3+ Strikes last turn, your first Strike each turn costs 0.

growth.name: Fungal Fortress
growth.text: End of turn: gain 1 Seed and 3 Block.

growth.name: Rooted Resolve
growth.text: Start of combat: gain 6 Block and 1 Seed.

growth.name: Nature's Boon
growth.text: Gain 2 Growth Runes. (Immediate.)

growth.name: Verdant Bond
growth.text: Whenever you play a Ritual, draw 1. (Max 1 per turn.)

growth.name: Seed of Renewal
growth.text: End of turn: remove 1 negative status from yourself.

growth.name: Overgrowth
growth.text: Gain 2 Seeds. This combat, your Strikes deal +1 and your Tactics gain +1 Block.

growth.name: Eternal Blossom
growth.text: After combat: upgrade 1 random card that you played this combat.

growth.name: Photosynthesis
growth.text: Gain 1 Energy. Exhaust.
